mapper.insert: insert into quit_prove (quit_id, material_id, quit_file_pic_url, quit_status) values (#{quitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quitFilePicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quitStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select quit_id, material_id, quit_file_pic_url, quit_status from quit_prove
